actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army, or his designee, to convey a parcel of land at the Fort Bliss Military Reservation in exchange for another parcel of land.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, or his designee, to convey a parcel of land at the Fort Bliss Military Reservation in exchange for another parcel of land.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Army, or his designee, to convey a parcel of land at the Fort Bliss Military Reservation in exchange for another parcel of land.
